Title: Data Scientist
Salary: $85,000 to $140,000
Location: Danbury, CT
Contact: Paul Chatlos, pchatlos@smithhanley.com
#GD

Are you looking to grow your career surrounded by some of the best and brightest in the industry? Then our client is looking for someone like you .

Data Scientist Responsibilities :

-Use predictive modeling to develop custom analytics
- Building of customer acquisition/retention modeling as well as optimization, response analysis and lifetime value modeling
-Evaluate sales performance by creating scoring mechanisms
-Create analysis to assist with strategic marketing decisions and business development
-Develop behavioral segmentation to support a framework for our customers
-Data Verification and Maintenance

Data Scientist Qualifications:

-Candidate must be proficient SAS and SQL with the ability to code in both
-Access a plus
-Database Development is a plus
-Digital and email online platforms knowledge is a plus
-MS in statistics, mathematics, computer science, or other quantitative discipline
-3+ years professional experience in a data driven role
-Excellent communication skills with the ability to interact with clients
